title: Papyrus fragments from The book of the dead
additional_titles: Man standing by an altar, apparently throwing a snake at a man with a lance; man on throne receiving gift from standing figure, Fragment 1|Man with spear standing before children or other diminutive figures with woman behind him holding up a ritual object, Fragment 2|Woman pouring water from a vase onto the upraised hands of a standing man, Fragment 3|Bird, Fragment 4|Standing figures with animal heads, Fragment 5|Two figures, barely discernible, Fragment 6|Indiscernible, Fragment 7|Figure and vertical object, Fragment 8|Isis and other standing figures, Fragment 9
